title: Urgot Q Audio desync
body:
With the recent changes to Urgot's Q detonation time, the previous audio of the charge detonating is no longer in sync with the damage. This ends up throwing off the way the charge feels, making it seem less fair to play against imo. Not sure if it's just something on my side or it just needs a small update to the timing of the sound effect.

Recreation is simple, play Urgot, use your q, the audio might shouldn't be matched to the explosion.
